page.title: 09HOME LIFE WEST LEOMINSTER
page.content: Life centres around the home. People have no organized entertainment and are reliant on their own resources. Many homes in the area are still without what other people consider essential - mains water, sewerage, electricity and gas - although most have electricity. People are very friendly towards each other and most of the inhabitants know everyone living here. There is a good community spirit and anyone would help in trouble or emergencies. There are no youth clubs and the young people tend to make their own entertainment in each other's homes. We seem to follow the national trend with a high divorce rate and many single-parent families. Most families have pet dogs and/or cats, etc.
